title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: The Role of Books and Social Media Integration in Remote Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in online learning
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of text/images in books on knowledge construction in remote environments.
Learners can produce content that critically reinterprets book content using social media platforms (Instagram, blogs, etc.).
Learners can compare book-based discussions and social media feedback in VR simulations to evaluate effective learning strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
